skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Grenville, Royal G-class Destroyer. I served as the lead ship and flagship of a destroyer squadron! However, it's a darn shame that I didn't leave behind much of a legacy because of my short service. If there's anything special I'd like you to know, um, I'm not fond of naval mines...
skins.acquisition: Heyyo~ Good morning, Commander! G-class Destroyer, Grenville, reporting for duty! Now that I'm here, you can leave everything to me and take a nap! Hehe, just kidding~ Let's get along well, all right?
skins.login: Commander, welcome back! Did you sleep well? If so, let's get started with today's work!
skins.details: Commander, I steeped tea according to Miss Hood's instructions. Care to try? Huh...? It's too sweet...? Ahaha... I suppose that big ol' scoop of honey was a bit overkill...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hehe, Commander, would you like to study etiquette with me~? For example, take this fine lady's hand gracefully like this~
skins.secretaryIdle2: As a lead ship, it's only right that I become a pillar of strength! Hehe~ Because of that, I'll continue to work hard!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even though I may be inexperienced, I have nothing to fear! What matters is the ability to overcome any adversity in the future... Hehe, sounds like I'm beginning to boast~
skins.secretaryTouch: Ahh... If only I could become an elegant lady like Miss Hood~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah?! Gosh... I'm going to get angry! Commander, you have to conduct yourself appropriately!
